name: Ensure that Encryption key is not scheduled for deletion
body: C﻿yscale looks for encryption keys scheduled for deletion.
remediationDescription:
D﻿epending on the provider and service that you use, check out the following resources:

#### A﻿WS
*﻿ [Deleting AWS KMS keys] (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/kms/latest/developerguide/deleting-keys.html)
